item.title: Long-term effect of bilingual education, Evidence from Mali
item.description: DiD in Mali exploiting the introduction of local languages in public primary education during the 1990s

item.title: RCT in Senegal assessing the impact of an offline library device
item.description: Impact evaluation assessing the effect of introducing Ideas Cubes provided by Bibliothèques Sans Frontières in remote schools in Senegal

item.title: Mahay Mikolo project in Madagascar
item.description: RCT in Madagascar trying to assess the added value of an integrated stimulation component into the existing countrywide nutrition & health program.
